actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for State and local taxes imposed on the rental of dwelling units.

summary.text: Allows, under the Internal Revenue Code, a tax deduction for State and local taxes imposed on the rental of dwelling units.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for State and local taxes imposed on the rental of dwelling units.
